remarks.para: May be inoperative provided visual confirmation of proper spoiler movement is made before each departure.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "SPOILER POS IND INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: The repetitive inspection required when this item is inoperative must be documented in the Aircraft Logbook at the prescribed intervals. (Refer to GMM, Chapter 3, Section 6.)

numlitem.para: Perform visual check of surface movement:

warning.para: ENSURE THAT PERSONNEL AND EQUIPMENT ARE CLEAR OF ALL FLIGHT CONTROL SURFACES.

numlitem.para: Establish communications – flight deck to ground.

entry.para: Observe that left wing spoilers extend.
Observe that right wing spoilers extend.

note.para: The most inboard spoilers will not extend, the second most inboard will extend approximately 20°, outboard four will extend approximately 45°.

numlitem.para: Restore aircraft to its required configuration.
